EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: FIRST NATIONS FISCAL AND STATISTICAL MANAGEMENT ACT

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, pursuant to subsection 107(1) and section 113 of the First Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Acta, hereby makes the annexed Statistical Data Disclosure Regulations.

Section.Text: The departments, bodies and corporations set out in the schedule are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 107(1) of the First Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act.
These Regulations come into force on the day on which they are registered.

Ministère des Pêches et des Océans
